name: Som tam, Thailand
details: Thailand's famous fiery salad features garlic and chillies alongside string beans and peanuts.

name: Poutine, Canada
details: This iconic Quebec dish mixes french fries, cheddar cheese and gravy to make one of Canada's iconic foods.

name: Tacos, Mexico
details: Tacos are a chief component of Mexican cuisine -- rolled-up tortillas stuffed with sizzling chunks of meat or vegetables, covered with guacamole and salsa.

name: Stinky tofu, Southeast Asia
details: This form of fermented tofu has a strong odor and a delicious taste.
